@vincentlistens @Netlify You can post to an form on @Netlify with JavaScript. The docs describe that here. https://t.co/QHREhMunSI Keep in mind that the endpoint is created if the buildbot sees an HTML form in your site, so if you don't want to expose the form in a page, add it to a dummy page.
